columns.description: StatsAPI game identifier shared with the odds snapshot.
columns.name: game_pk

columns.description: Local date for the listed matchup (YYYY-MM-DD).
columns.name: game_date

columns.description: SportsbookReview team abbreviation for the home club.
columns.name: home_team_abbr

columns.description: SportsbookReview abbreviation for the visiting club.
columns.name: away_team_abbr

columns.description: Home score when the odds snapshot was reconciled (usually final).
columns.name: home_score

columns.description: Away score when the odds snapshot was reconciled.
columns.name: away_score

columns.description: SportsbookReview moneyline price for the home team (American odds).
columns.name: home_moneyline

columns.description: SportsbookReview moneyline price for the road team (American odds).
columns.name: away_moneyline

columns.description: American-odds payout for the home runline.
columns.name: home_runline_odds

columns.description: American-odds payout for the away runline.
columns.name: away_runline_odds

description: Moneyline and runline prices scraped from SportsbookReview (SBR) for each MLB matchup, keyed by StatsAPI game id.
name: Raw Game Odds Sbr
